initial_propose.protocol_description: DencentNet is a decentralized social media platform where users can post content and interact directly with followers, providing a transparent and uncensored space.
initial_propose.title: Implementing a Tiered Reward System to Encourage Active Participation
initial_propose.description: At present, DencentNet rewards all contents equally, regardless of the engagement they receive. This proposal suggests implementing a tiered reward system that considers likes, shares, and comments. Such a system could encourage users to create more engaging content, enhancing the overall user experience. This approach needs thoughtful deliberation from the DencentNet community and token holders.

counter_propose.protocol_description: DencentNet is a decentralized social media platform where users can post content and interact directly with followers, providing transparent and uncensored space.
counter_propose.title: Introducing a Hybrid Reward System to Encourage Quality Content and Active Participation
counter_propose.description: Reflecting on community's feedback, this counter-proposal suggests introducing a hybrid reward system. Every post will continue to get a basic reward, acknowledging the user's effort. For contents that receive higher engagement, such as likes, shares, and comments, an additional bonus reward will be provided, fostering quality and creativity. This proposal ensures that new and less popular creators remain incentivized to share their content, while promoting high-engaging content. It also includes setting clear and concrete engagement metrics, enhanced content moderation efforts, and dispute management mechanisms for a fair implementation. The DencentNet community and token holders are urged to deliberate on this updated proposal.
